moduleMetadataJson.name: Get the Vehicle Information Such as the VIN from the Target Module
moduleMetadataJson.description:
Post Module to query DTCs, Some common engine info and Vehicle Info.
                               It returns such things as engine speed, coolant temp, Diagnostic
                               Trouble Codes as well as All info stored by Mode $09 Vehicle Info, VIN, etc
author: Craig Smith

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DSTID
options.description: Expected reponse ID, defaults to SRCID + 8

options.name: CLEAR_DTCS
options.description: Clear any DTCs and reset MIL if errors are present

options.name: CANBUS
options.description: CAN Bus to perform scan on, defaults to connected bus
